title: Quiz  - SchemesTap 16th to 31st December 2022
instruction: India is known for its traditions and culture, Minority communities in India are known for their traditional skills, arts & crafts but due to forces of competitive market and globalization and also due to deteriorating socio-economic condition of master craftsmen/artisan, these skills are not being pursued by the young generation. Ministry of Minority Affairs is of firm conviction that these arts/ crafts are needed to be preserved especially traditional skills, arts & crafts of the minority communities. This scheme aims to preserve heritage of traditional arts and crafts of minority communities.

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment.

B. It was launched in the year 2021.

C. The scheme is a Central Sector Scheme.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: The scheme mentioned in the above paragraph was previously known as?
options: National Action Plan for Old Age People
National Action Plan for Senior Citizens
National Action Plan for Widows
National Action Plan for Disabled Persons
None of the Above

quiz.text: Which among the following are the sub-schemes under the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?
options: Rashtriya Vayoshri Yojana (RVY)
State Action Plan for Senior Citizens (SAPSrC)
Scheme for Awareness Generation and Capacity Building for welfare of Senior Citizens
Scheme of Integrated Programme for Senior Citizens (IPSrC)
All of the above

quiz.text: Under this scheme, establishments already registered before the commencement of this Scheme shall have to employ, over and above the reference base, minimum ____ new employees (if the reference base of employee is less than or equal to 50) and minimum ____ new employees (if the reference base of employees is more than 50).

Three, Four

options: One
Two
Three
Four
Five

quiz.text:

quiz.text:
Which of the following does the National Overseas Scholarship Scheme support?

A. Scheduled Castes

B. Denotified Nomadic Tribes

options: A student must get at least 60% of marks or equivalent grade in the qualifying examination would be required.
In case of Ph.D courses, the qualifying exam would be Masterâ€™s Degree.

quiz.text:
Which of the following pollution abatement work is done under the National River Conservation Plan?

A.     Setting up of Sewage Treatment Plants (STPs) for treating the diverted sewage

B.      Construction of Low Cost Sanitation Toilets to prevent open defecation on river banks

C.      Construction of Electric Crematoria and Improved Wood Crematoria to conserve the use of wood

D.     River Front Development works, such as improvement of bathing ghats
options: A, B and C
A, B and D
B, C and D
A, C and D
A, B, C and D

quiz.text: Which of the following organisations is the implementing agency of national River Conservation plan?
options: Central Pollution Control Board

Department of Water Resource Management
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with respect to the PMFME scheme?

Only C
A and B

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to PMFME scheme?
options: Scheme aims to cover 2,00,000 enterprises with an outlay of Rs. 10,000 Crore
Seed capital @ Rs. 40,000 per SHG member for working capital & purchase of small tools
Capital subsidy @35% of the project cost to be provided (maximum Rs. 10 lakh/unit)
Individual micro enterprises should have employed less than 10 workers
Beneficiaries need to contribute minimum 20% of the project cost.

28
35

quiz.text:
Which of the following are the objectives of the above-mentioned scheme?

A.     To build capacity of master craftsmen/artisans and training of young generation through the master craftsmen/ artisans for traditional arts/crafts

B.      Set up standards of identified arts/ crafts and their documentation

C.      To establish linkages of traditional skills with the global market
options: A and B only
B and C only
C and A only
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text:

A.     Apprenticeship stipend for Research and Development

B.      Support to Craft museum for curating traditional arts/ crafts

C.      Support to minority craftsmen/artisans through Hunar Haat and Shilp Utsav

D.     Recognition of talented Master Craftsmen & Artisans
options: A, B and C
B, C and D
A, C and D
A, B and D
A, B, C and D

options: 2013
2015
